tests.description: Verify that user accesses history page through bottom navigation bar icon
tests.cucumberScenario:
Scenario: Access History Page
  Given I am on the home page
  When I click on history icon in bottom navigation bar
  Then I should see history page with storm history toggle

tests.description: Verify that user switches to storm history feed by clicking on toggle at top left part of the screen
tests.cucumberScenario:
Scenario: Switch to Storm History Feed
  Given I am on history page
  When I click on storm history toggle at top left part of the screen
  Then I should see list of storm operations

tests.description: Verify that user can view storm operations as a list in history view
tests.cucumberScenario:
Scenario: View Storm Operations
  Given I am on storm history feed page
  When I see list of storm operations
  Then each operation card should contain client's msisdn, storm amount, and operation status

tests.description: Verify that user can view storm details by clicking on storm operation card
tests.cucumberScenario:
Scenario: View Storm Details
  Given I am on storm history feed page
  When I click on a storm operation card
  Then I should see individual storm details including client's msisdn, storm amount, and operation status

tests.description: Verify that user can filter storm operations by MSISDN
tests.cucumberScenario:
Scenario: Filter Storm Operations by MSISDN
  Given I am on storm history feed page
  When I select a client's msisdn for filtering
  Then only operations for that msisdn should be displayed

tests.description: Verify that user can filter storm operations by date
tests.cucumberScenario:
Scenario: Filter Storm Operations by Date
  Given I am on storm history feed page
  When I select a date for filtering
  Then only operations performed within that date range should be displayed
